rawgoatsmilk:  You've got to be joking. Mac programs do not end in ".exe". Next time check what platform the download is, rather than just assuming everything is for Windows.

i can confirm that the language .iso's for windows will work on this version for mac... Just burn the language .iso's with disk utility and enjoy!

I downloaded this but it keeps opening in text edit.  Any ideas?? Thanks
Ok i figured it out, for those with the text file problem download stuffit expander.  extract the files then burn the image to disc using disc utility works perfect now.
